attributes.action: Act on petitions with more than ½ million signatures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's not enough this site allowing petitions if the executive are then free to ignore said petition. This petition calls upon the executive to note AND implement action on a petition that obtains more than ½ million signatures.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
